sentences.sContent: Some countries lack a suitable economic infrastructure.
sentences.sCn: 一些国家缺乏适当的经济基础设施。

sentences.sContent: a $65 billion investment package in education, health care and infrastructure
sentences.sCn: 用于教育、医疗和基础设施的650亿美元一揽子投资计划

phrases.pCn: 基础设施；基础设施建设

remMethod.val: infra(在下) + struct(建筑) + ure → 建筑下面的结构 → 基础设施

trans.tranCn: 基础设施， 公共建设； 下部构造
trans.tranOther: the basic systems and structures that a country or organization needs in order to work properly, for example roads, railways, banks etc
